.. _amg:

amg
===

.. currentmodule:: ansys.fluent.core.solver.settings_231.amg

.. autoclass:: amg
    :show-inheritance:
    :undoc-members:
.. rubric:: Children

==============================================================   ========================================================

Child                                                                                                             Summary

==============================================================   ========================================================
:ref:`enforce_laplace_coarsening <enforce_laplace_coarsening>`       Enable/disable the use of laplace coarsening in AMG.

:ref:`increase_pre_sweeps <increase_pre_sweeps>`                               Enable/disable increase in AMG pre-sweeps.

:ref:`pre_sweeps <pre_sweeps_3>`                                                        Set the number of AMG pre-sweeps.

:ref:`specify_coarsening_rate <specify_coarsening_rate>`                              Enable/disable AMG coarsening rate.

:ref:`coarsen_rate <coarsen_rate>`                                                               Set AMG coarsening rate.
